item.title: Project 8: Alien Jump - Game Project Management
item.description: Alien Jump, Level 1 Link to play Alien Jump Link to GitHub Repository Imagine you are an alien, and after an emergency crash landing onto Earth, you must get back to the mothership to return home. This game is inspired by the Doodle Jump mobile game that has a player jumping from platforms and getting vertically higher. There will be static platforms, moving platforms, and enemies that try to make your player fall.
